definition.text: The viewport is a window through which you may look into the charting space.

paragraphs.text: The viewport offers an opening into the visual environment in which you may see, analyze and go over every piece of data involved in the process of trading cryptocurrencies:
Data crunched in the form of indicators;
The specific effects of the rules you will program into your strategies, and how strategies behave during testing and live trading sessions.
The information that is out of focus, that is, out of the viewport, is not read nor rendered graphically, thus, does not consume resources.
